### 5.0 Notice Description
The purpose of this Negotiated Request for Proposal (NRFP) is to seek proposals for a social media monitoring, analysis, and reporting platform. The platform will be used by Destination Canada to provide its marketing and analytics teams with valuable insights into brand performance, including engagement, sentiment, conversations, and content trends.

The ideal platform should provide thorough reporting, track relevant conversations online, curate relevant content, and analyze influencers and competitors within the tourism industry. The platform will enable Destination Canada to gain a better understanding of its audience and brand's relevance, ultimately informing its marketing strategies and initiatives.
